price: 27. Ya soló, bango balingi (bomoyi) ya nsé, mpe batiki sima na bango mokolo ya kilo mpe ya somo.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi yuḥibbūna al-ʿājilata wayadharūna warāahum yawman thaqīlan
